title: rerolling champs at aram
body: â€‹I was playing aram then i rr amumu to get another cham and i got irelia which i rr again but when i did that i get amumu again so wtf? i rr amumu to get amumu again then wtf? i spent both of my rr chances

replies.body: Luck of the draw, friend!  Amumu just wants a friend.  :(

Working as intended. When you rerolled Amumu to get Irelia, Amumu went back into the pool of possible champs. As such, when you rerolled Irelia, Amumu was an available option, and you just happened to get him.
All Random All Mid not All Fair All Mid though i do like the shortened version of that. AFAM

I just got shen 3 times in a row in arams. 3 times.  I have 42 available champs. Want to know what the odds of that happening are supposed to be? .0008 % 

Random my ass.
